amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct audits relating to the timely access of veterans to hospital care, medical services, and other health care from the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2772 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2772 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7853; text: CR S7853) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct audits relating to the timely access of veterans to hospital care, medical services, and other health care from the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2772 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2772 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 2763.
